ss.qwirkle.common.player

Class ServerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ss.qwirkle.common.player.Player
      • ss.qwirkle.common.player.ServerPlayer

  • public class ServerPlayer
extends Player
    A player that is controlled by a remote user through a server. The functions in this class should not have to be called at all by the client.
    Author:
    Karanum
